The photo was published on February 1: 2021, in a Facebook post that was shared more than 15,000 times.
The Burmese: language caption of the photo refers to the teachings of the Buddha and mentions Aung San Suu Kyi being detained during the military coup.
The photo circulated after Myanmar: s military seized power in a coup against Suu Kyi's civilian government on February 1, 2021, and declared a year-long state of emergency.
A reverse image search on Google reveale: 2017, which was over three years before the coup took place.
